[demo](https://hydra.ojack.xyz/?%3D%3D)

![alt text](./image/002.png)

a.setBins(4)
a.setSmooth(0.9)
noise(()=>a.fft[2]*10+5,0.1,0.2)
.modulate(noise(20,0.1,0.2))
.modulateScale(osc(45,0.01,0.03))
.color(()=>a.fft[2]/2.1+0.5,()=>a.fft[2]/1.9+0.5,()=>a.fft[1]/1.98+0.48)
.modulateScale(noise(()=>a.fft[2]/2+5,0.5))
.diff(shape(4,()=>a.fft[3]+0.14,()=>a.fft[1]+0.3).repeatX(3).rotate(()=>Math.sin(time/4.5)))
.mult(shape(4,0.9))
.out(o0)
